// src/pages/AddStudent.js
import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./AddStudent.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddStudent=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState({fullname:'',email:'',course_of_study:'',year:'',gpa:''});const handleChange=e=>{setData({...data,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/student/',data);alert('Student added successfully');}catch(error){console.error('Error while saving student',error);alert('Error while saving student');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-student",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add Student"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"fullname",value:data.fullname,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Full Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",value:data.email,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"course_of_study",value:data.course_of_study,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Course of Study"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"year",value:data.year,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Year",min:"1",max:"8"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"gpa",value:data.gpa,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"GPA",step:"0.1",min:"0",max:"4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Student"})]})]});};export default AddStudent;
